trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand> event is raised when the `Cancel` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand>denne hendelsen oppstår når den `Cancel` knapp for et element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand> event is raised when the `Delete` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand>denne hendelsen oppstår når den `Delete` knapp for et element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand> event is raised when the `Edit` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand>denne hendelsen oppstår når den `Edit` knapp for et element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand> event is raised when any button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand>denne hendelsen oppstår når noen button for et element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCommand>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically test for when a specific command button is clicked and take appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg programmatisk teste mot når en bestemt kommando-knappen og nødvendige handlingene.

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to handle custom command buttons for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen brukes vanligvis til å behandle egendefinert kommandoknappene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand> event is raised when the `Update` button for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand>denne hendelsen oppstår når den `Update` knapp for et element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.UpdateCommand>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of DataListCommandEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av DataListCommandEventArgs, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å opprette og starte en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs> is created by a call to this constructor, the following properties are initialized to the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Når en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs>er opprettet av et kall til denne konstruktøren følgende egenskaper blir initialisert til de angitte verdiene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |Item|The value of the `item` parameter.| |CommandSource|The value of the `commandSource` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | Elementet | Verdien for den `item` parameteren. | | CommandSource | Verdien for den `commandSource` parameteren. |

trans-unit.source: The selected item from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det valgte elementet fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> that contains the original event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder den opprinnelige Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Gets the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Henter kilden for kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandSource property to determine the command source that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Bruk CommandSource-egenskapen til å fastsette kilden for kommandoen som hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to determine which command raises the event.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis til å finne ut hvilken kommando opphøyer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: You can then take appropriate action, based on the command.
trans-unit.target: Du kan da passende, basert på kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the item containing the command source in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter elementet som inneholder kommandoen kilden i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Item property to access information about the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk elementegenskapen å få informasjon om det valgte elementet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> object that represents the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"> </xref> objektet som representerer det valgte elementet i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref> kontrollen.
